text: A short but memorable track from one of my favorite soundtracks of all time.ï»¿ The first Wild Arms is probably in my Top 50, mostly due to the music, the great story, Lufia-style dungeon puzzles and lots of nostalgia. It's with this game that I first really noticed how big of a role good music played in video games.
